meanings.definition: A device that allows different pieces of equipment to be connected or used together.
meanings.sent1: I needed adapters to connect my old printer to the new computer.
meanings.sent2: The adapters helped me link the camera to the laptop for easy transfer.
meanings.sent3: The adapters were like magical bridges between my gadgets.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity acted as adapters, seamlessly merging art and technology.
meanings.sent5: The adapters acted as matchmakers, uniting the incompatible devices.

meanings.definition: A person who adapts or changes to new circumstances.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather is a great adapter, always finding solutions to problems.
meanings.sent2: She is a quick adapter, adjusting easily to the changing work environment.
meanings.sent3: The adapter at the office party was the first to try the new dance moves.
meanings.sent4: He became an adapter in the face of adversity, embracing change with grace.
meanings.sent5: The adapter in the group was the one who suggested a different route to the destination.
